articles.title: Riot on how League of Legends’ latest character may have gotten a little too real - Polygon
articles.description: Seraphine, League of Legends’ newest champion, has a Twitter account that started off mostly harmless but then took a turn for the weird once the character started voicing anxieties and asking her followers for help.

articles.title: Pokimane wants Twitch fans to stop giving her so much money - Polygon
articles.description: Twitch streamer Pokimane made waves in November by announcing that from now on, viewers can’t donate more than five dollars to her stream. The livestreamer says that other performers can use the cash more. Most viewers and entertainers are responding positive…
